messages.subject: Fwd: [HEM-Networking] Walden Books discount
messages.msgSnippet: ... [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
messages.messageBody:
>HEM-Networking-owner@yahoogroups.com
>Delivered-To: mailing list HEM-Networking@yahoogroups.com
>List-Unsubscribe: <mailto:HEM-Networking-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com>
>Date: Fri, 20 Sep 2002 16:22:53 -0400
>Subject: [HEM-Networking] Walden Books discount
>Reply-To: HEM-Networking@yahoogroups.com
>
>To whom it may concern:
>
>Whenever a business does something special for teachers, homeschoolers often
>are left out. I don't know how to reach those in your group, but I wanted to
>let all homeschoolers know that from October 4-6, Waldenbooks is doing
>educator appreciation days nationwide. Any educator, including a home
>schooler, will save 25% on everything they buy, except for magazines and gift
>certificates! Unlike our regular teacher discount, this is not just for
>items purchased for teaching purposes, but anything the teacher wants for
>him/herself as well!
>

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
